code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../../../apis";export var getTags=function getTags(){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/tags"));};export var getArticleByTag=function getArticleByTag(tag,token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},params:{tag:tag}});};export var getArticleByTagNoToken=function getArticleByTagNoToken(tag){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},params:{tag:tag}});};
